meanings.sent1: My faves include ice cream and puppies.
meanings.sent2: She showed me her faves in the photo album.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone brought their faves for a fun time.
meanings.sent4: Her faves were like a colorful bouquet of happiness.
meanings.sent5: The little girl's faves were her teddy bear and bedtime stories.

meanings.definition: To prefer or choose as a favorite
meanings.sent1: I always faves chocolate over vanilla ice cream.
meanings.sent2: He faves spending time outdoors on weekends.
meanings.sent3: She faves teasing her brother for fun.
meanings.sent4: Choosing the right book to read faves me every time.
meanings.sent5: His faves include hiking and exploring new trails.
